Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/bc45ee5c5c57033baa8c7b3a6acc55f3/tumblr_inline_n83r09ZBWB1rr2wit.png"/></p>

<p>Another six company logos to be seen in <em>Kerbal Space program: First Contract</em> have been revealed. This brings the current total to eighteen of them so far. Which one of them is your favorite? View them all <a href="http://bit.ly/1rkr6RL"><strong>HERE</strong></a>.</p>
I like how there's a mix of 'kerbal' (Maxco Construction Toys) and serious (C7 Aerospace). I think that's how the game should be.
You guys now realize that you have to release 0.24 when you reveal 24 logos.
Yea. With any luck they wont look it up in the rule book. So don't tell them.
Hold on. Are you serious about the 24 logos=release or not? I can't tell. It's the internet, you know.

Jedi: They are being hopeful. But, in one way. It makes Kerbal sense. Show all the logos. Give yourself more time to work on coding and then release when you finished with all the logos. Gives plenty of time and fudge factor. No new logos just means they need more time. Kind of like how we start out in career mode. Before we can do a lot of space flight we had done before in sandbox.
While I don't think it's going to happen, I would LOVE to play KSP .24 over my 4th of July holiday weekend.

Hold on. Are you serious about the 24 logos=release or not? I can't tell. It's the internet, you know.

Not true unless you hear it from us. We're getting to 24 logos tomorrow, just not 0.24. Not quite yet.
^He works for them, he can't be trusted! They know they've been had
Am I the only one here that sees only 1 logo?

Not true unless you hear it from us. We're getting to 24 logos tomorrow, just not 0.24. Not quite yet.

At lease all the "release it now" nonsense is in good fun. In some communities, even the mention of patches sends people running with scissors into the street with plastic bags on their heads.

Am I the only one here that sees only 1 logo?

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/content/289-Eighteen-0-24-Company-Logos-Revealed!

At lease all the "release it now" nonsense is in good fun. In some communities, even the mention of patches sends people running with scissors into the street with plastic bags on their heads.

i lol'd.

reminds me of near every early access steam forum that i enter.

At lease all the "release it now" nonsense is in good fun. In some communities, even the mention of patches sends people running with scissors into the street with plastic bags on their heads.

Now now, if that were true then we would have less of them to deal with.
